snippet.title: XCOM: Enemy Within -- Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The war continues with XCOM: Enemy Within, the expansion to the 2012 Game of the Year award-winning strategy game XCOM: Enemy Unknown. Learn more at http://www.xcom.com.

XCOM: Enemy Unknown Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/XCOM
